title: Weird "attempting to reconnect" issue

embed.description: NO WAY, I HAVE NEVER TILTED IN MY LIFE BUT WHAT HAS CAUSED ME TO GET SO FRUSTRATED WITH THIS GAME?

body: I keep encountering unexplainable lag problems that happen very often, and are kind of hard to describe but I found a video on pants are dragon's channel where the same thing occurred to him (skip to 9:44 in the vid). Anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: I'm not sure if this is the same problem, but I used to be having issues with massive lag spikes and attempting to reconnect messages. I switched from Wi-Fi to an Ethernet cable and it's been working for me since so that might fix it for you.

It sounds like you're having an unstable connection to the game server, but I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to know for sure.  Let me know the results, and we'll dig deeper!
Same thing actually happened to me last night on EUNE...i seriously have no idea what is going on...
